H0.text: What was left in Pandora's Box after all the evil escaped. Light

H1.text: What was left in Pandora's Box after all the evil escaped. Forgiveness

H2.text: What was left in Pandora's Box after all the evil escaped. Courage

H3.text: What was left in Pandora's Box after all the evil escaped. Hope

A5.text: Only the voice of Hope is left to comfort her at the end.
